DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : A personalized Internet-based weight-loss program may help improve quality life colorectal cancer survivor . PURPOSE : This randomized phase I trial study well Internet-based program work help colorectal cancer survivor lose weight .
DOC.brief_title: Internet-Based Weight-Loss Program Colorectal Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To evaluate feasibility implement Internet-based weight-loss intervention colorectal cancer ( CRC ) survivor . - To obtain preliminary outcome data impact Internet-based intervention weight loss , waist circumference , physical activity , diet , weight-control strategy , weight-loss intention , exercise diet self-efficacy , perceive weight-loss barrier among CRC survivor . - To obtain preliminary data potential moderator ( sociodemographics , disease treatment characteristic , prior Internet experience , depressive symptom , diet weight-loss experience , weight-loss expectation , physical activity dietary outcome expectancy ) weight loss among CRC survivor use Internet-based weight-loss intervention . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord time since completion cancer treatment ( 1 2 year vs 3 4 year vs 5 6 year vs 7 10 year ) . Patients randomize 1 2 intervention arm . - Arm I ( 12-week Internet-based weight-loss intervention ) : Patients attend in-person 60-minute session health educator . The health educator review patient 's weight history , current eating habit , prior current level physical activity , reason want lose weight , current weight , weight-loss goal , barrier weight loss . The health educator provide basic weight-loss advice patient , accord establish guideline , advice diet modification reduce caloric intake . The health educator also recommend gradual increase physical activity help patient set realistic target weight achieve end 12-week intervention period . The health educator introduce intervention website patient assist patient set confidential , unique login username password provide secure access study website . Patients ask provide email address . After log onto website view introductory page , patient prompt specify target weight end 12-week intervention provide list reason want lose weight . Next , website prompt patient list specific strategy plan use achieve desire weight loss . The health educator guide patient enter initial set strategy provide patient list examples weight-loss strategy encourage patient generate his/her specific , personalized strategy . Patients also able select adapt strategy example list feel appropriate . The health educator ensure patient comfortable use website give patient one-page write summary use website phone number e-mail address use receive technical help website . Additionally , patient advise login website twice week 12-week intervention period prompt report weight , review update reason weight loss , indicate success implement weight-loss strategy , rate perceive effectiveness weight-loss strategy , revise create new strategy need . Patients also receive automate e-mails prompt visit website provide weight-loss tip motivational message . The website also provide additional resource , include list credible external website useful weight loss information healthy recipe , summary weight-loss tip , tip create appropriate weight-loss strategy , examples weight-loss strategy . - Arm II ( wait-list control ) : Patients instruct continue usual dietary physical activity routines 12-week wait period . After wait period , patient receive Internet-based weight-loss intervention 12 week arm I . Patients arm complete survey baseline 12 week assess sociodemographics , disease treatment characteristic , prior Internet experience , depressive symptom , weight , diet weight-loss experience , weight-loss expectation , physical activity dietary outcome expectancy . Patients arm II also complete additional follow-up survey 24 week .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis colorectal cancer ( CRC ) Stage IIII disease Completed treatment CRC 110 year ago No current evidence cancer PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not nurse Not pregnant within past 6 month plan become pregnant Speaks English Has access Internet home work Lives within 50 mile Fox Chase Cancer Center ( FCCC ) Body mass index 25 35 kg/m^2 No weight loss â‰¥ 15 lb within past 6 month No history eat disorder None follow medical condition : Myocardial infarction stroke within past 6 month Type I diabetes Uncontrolled hypertension Unstable angina Congestive heart failure PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics No concurrent weightloss medication ( intervention phase )
